name: Shooting Star (itch) (To_Binio)
description:
Shooting Star

is a highscore game with an online leaderboard where you can fly with your spacecraft and defend yourself against drones that don't like your existence very much.
So try to stay alive as long as possible and kill the drones.

Leaderboard

First of all, I sadly didn't get it to work in the WebGL build :( sry
So it is only available in the downloaded Version

To login/register just enter your wished username and a password in the login field.
No worries, I don't save your password in clear text (I hashed it as you should do anyway)

Controlls

are overall very simple

Your spacecraft will fly directly to your mouse,
click the left mouse button to shoot
and maybe there is more (Settings Menu)

Tipps

Settings Menu

or simply said...
use the "dev keys": Space; R

And don't forget to write a comment if you have feedback :)
